entry.title: Teka Teki
entry.content:
Question

What does ps3 sets and women’s breasts have in common?

Answer

Both are intended for children, but it’s the fathers that always end up playing with them.

Contributed by M Bazli B Othman (ECRO/PETH)

entry.title: Pilihan Raya ke?
entry.content:
Scenario

When they have their passport photo as their profile picture. (Be it Facebook, MSN….)

Answer

lu ingat pilihan raya ke (You thought you are running for election?)

Contributed by Mr Ong XXX XXXN

entry.title: Level of Desperation
entry.content:
Level 1: You miss that thing.

Level 2: You think of it everyday.

Level 3: You are finding something to replace it.

Level 4: You try to convince yourself that you have it.

Level 5: You hypnotized yourself that you are having it.. but your heart has given up.

Level 6: You already found a replacement for it.

p/s: Sorry I do not have a Richter Scale for it.
